extension.description: Watch Turkish series and shows from Turkish123. Features smart caching for fast playback, favorites, watch history, and resume positions.

extension.news: v1.0.0 (2025-12-25) - Initial release - Browse series catalog - Smart 2-level caching (fast playback) - Search functionality - Favorites system - Watch history and continue watching - Resume playback positions - Auto-play next episode
